NodeFile NodeFile Class

In this Article

Edit

Exposes methods and properties to access files from Nodes or Tasks.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class NodeFile : IInheritedBehaviorsPublic MustInherit Class NodeFile
    Implements IInheritedBehaviors

Properties

  • Edit
    CustomBehaviors
    CustomBehaviors

    Gets or sets a list of behaviors that modify or customize requests to the Batch service made via this NodeFile.

    public IList<BatchClientBehavior> CustomBehaviors { get; set; }Public Property CustomBehaviors As IList(Of BatchClientBehavior)

    Property Value

    • IList<BatchClientBehavior>
      IList(Of BatchClientBehavior)

    Remarks

    These behaviors are inherited by child objects.

    Modifications are applied in the order of the collection. The last write wins.

  • Edit

    CopyToStream(Stream, GetFileRequestByteRange, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>)
    CopyToStream(Stream, GetFileRequestByteRange, IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior))

    Blocking call to copy the contents of the file into the given Stream.

    public virtual void CopyToStream(Stream stream, GetFileRequestByteRange byteRange = null, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null)Public Overridable Sub CopyToStream(stream As Stream, byteRange As GetFileRequestByteRange = Nothing, additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing)

    Parameters

    • stream
      Stream
      Stream

      The stream into which the contents of the file are copied.

    • byteRange
      GetFileRequestByteRange
      GetFileRequestByteRange

      The file byte range to retrieve. If null, the entire file is retrieved.

    • additionalBehaviors
      IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>
      IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

      A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.

  • Edit
    CopyToStreamAsync(Stream, GetFileRequestByteRange, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>, CancellationToken)
    CopyToStreamAsync(Stream, GetFileRequestByteRange, IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior), CancellationToken)

    Begins an asynchronous call to copy the contents of the file into the given Stream.

    public abstract Task CopyToStreamAsync(Stream stream, GetFileRequestByteRange byteRange = null, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Public MustOverride Function CopyToStreamAsync(stream As Stream, byteRange As GetFileRequestByteRange = Nothing, additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

    Parameters

    • stream
      Stream
      Stream

      The stream into which the contents of the file are copied.

    • byteRange
      GetFileRequestByteRange
      GetFileRequestByteRange

      The file byte range to retrieve. If null, the entire file is retrieved.

    • additionalBehaviors
      IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>
      IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

      A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.

    • cancellationToken
      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      A CancellationToken for controlling the lifetime of the asynchronous operation.

    Returns

    • Task
      Task

      A Task object that represents the asynchronous operation.

  • Edit
    Delete(Nullable<Boolean>, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>)
    Delete(Nullable(Of Boolean), IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior))

    Blocking call to delete the file.

    public virtual void Delete(bool ? recursive = null, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null)Public Overridable Sub Delete(recursive As Boolean? = Nothing, additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing)

    Parameters

    • recursive
      Nullable<Boolean>
      Nullable(Of Boolean)

      If the file-path parameter represents a directory instead of a file, you can set the optional recursive parameter to true to delete the directory and all of the files and subdirectories in it. If recursive is false then the directory must be empty or deletion will fail.

    • additionalBehaviors
      IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>
      IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

      A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.

  • Edit

    Begins an asynchronous call to delete the file.

    Parameters

    • recursive
      Nullable<Boolean>
      Nullable(Of Boolean)

      If the file-path parameter represents a directory instead of a file, you can set the optional recursive parameter to true to delete the directory and all of the files and subdirectories in it. If recursive is false then the directory must be empty or deletion will fail.

      IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>
      IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

    ReadAsString(Encoding, GetFileRequestByteRange, IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior))

    Blocking call to return the contents of the file as a string.

    public string ReadAsString(Encoding encoding = null, GetFileRequestByteRange byteRange = null, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null)Public Function ReadAsString(encoding As Encoding = Nothing, byteRange As GetFileRequestByteRange = Nothing, additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing) As String

    Parameters

    • encoding
      Encoding
      Encoding

      The encoding used to interpret the file data. If no value or null is specified, UTF8 is used.

    • byteRange
      GetFileRequestByteRange
      GetFileRequestByteRange

      The file byte range to retrieve. If null, the entire file is retrieved.

    • additionalBehaviors
      IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>
      IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

      A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied after the CustomBehaviors on the current object.

    Returns

    • String
      String

      A string containing the contents of the file.

    Refresh(DetailLevel, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>)
    Refresh(DetailLevel, IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior))

    Refreshes the current NodeFile.

    public abstract void Refresh(DetailLevel detailLevel = null, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null)Public MustOverride Sub Refresh(detailLevel As DetailLevel = Nothing, additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing)

    Parameters

    • detailLevel
      DetailLevel
      DetailLevel

      The detail level for the refresh. If a detail level which omits the Name property is specified, refresh will fail.

    • additionalBehaviors
      IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>
      IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior)

      A collection of BatchClientBehavior instances that are applied to the Batch service request after the CustomBehaviors.

  • Edit
    RefreshAsync(DetailLevel, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>, CancellationToken)
    RefreshAsync(DetailLevel, IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior), CancellationToken)

    Refreshes the current NodeFile.

    public abstract Task RefreshAsync(DetailLevel detailLevel = null, IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Public MustOverride Function RefreshAsync(detailLevel As DetailLevel = Nothing, additionalBehaviors As IEnumerable(Of BatchClientBehavior) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

      DetailLevel
      DetailLevel

      IEnumerable<BatchClientBehavior>

      CancellationToken
      CancellationToken

      A CancellationToken for controlling the lifetime of the asynchronous operation.

      Task

      A Task representing the asynchronous refresh operation.
